00014 class ImageFormat_raw: public FileFormat
00015 {
00016     typedef std::map<std::string, unsigned short> typemap;
00017 protected:
00018     std::string suffixes( io_modes /*modes=both*/ )const {
00019         return std::string( "raw" );
00020     }
00021 public:
00022     std::string getName()const {
00023         return "raw data output";
00024     }
00025     virtual std::string dialects( const std::string & ) const {
00026         std::string ret;
00027         typemap types = util::getTransposedTypeMap( false, true );
00028         types.erase( "boolean*" );
00029         types.erase( "date*" );
00030         types.erase( "timestamp*" );
00031         types.erase( "selection*" );
00032         BOOST_FOREACH( typemap::const_reference pair, types ) {
00033             ret += pair.first.substr( 0, pair.first.length() - 1 );
00034             ret += " ";
00035         }
00036         return ret;
00037     }
00038 
00039 
00040     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00041 
00042         data::FilePtr mfile( filename );
00043 
00044         if( !mfile.good() ) {
00045             throwSystemError( errno, std::string( "Failed to open " ) + filename );
00046         }
00047 
00048         const size_t fsize = mfile.getLength();
00049 
00050         const unsigned short type = util::getTransposedTypeMap( false, true )[dialect + "*"];
00051 
00052         if( type == 0 ) {
00053             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "No known datatype given, you have to give the type of the raw data as rdialect (eg. \"-rdialect u16bit\")";
00054             throwGenericError( "No known datatype" );
00055         }
00056 
00057 
00058         data::ValuePtrReference dataRef = mfile.atByID( type, 0 );
00059         const size_t elemSize = dataRef->bytesPerElem();
00060 
00061         const size_t ssize = sqrt( fsize / elemSize );
00062 
00063         if( ssize *ssize *elemSize == fsize ) {
00064             LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Guessing size of read and phase to be " << ssize;
00065 
00066             chunks.push_back( data::Chunk( dataRef, ssize, ssize ) );
00067             data::Chunk &ch = chunks.back();
00068             ch.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", 0 );
00069             ch.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", 0 );
00070             ch.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( 1, 1, 1 ) );
00071             ch.setPropertyAs( "rowVec", util::fvector4( 1, 0 ) );
00072             ch.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( 0, 1 ) );
00073             ch.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4( 0, 0 ) );
00074             return 1;
00075         } else {
00076             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Could not guess image size for " << fsize << " bytes of data";
00077             return 0;
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081     void write( const data::Image &image, const std::string &filename, const std::string &/*dialect*/ )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00082         class WriteOp: public data::ChunkOp
00083         {
00084             std::ofstream out;
00085             unsigned short typeID;
00086         public:
00087             WriteOp( std::string fname, unsigned short ID ): out( fname.c_str() ), typeID( ID ) {
00088                 out.exceptions( std::ios::failbit | std::ios::badbit );
00089             }
00090             bool operator()( data::Chunk &ref, util::vector4<size_t> /*posInImage*/ ) {
00091                 const boost::shared_ptr<const void> data( ref.getValuePtrBase().getRawAddress() );
00092                 const size_t data_size = ref.bytesPerVoxel() * ref.getVolume();
00093                 out.write( static_cast<const char *>( data.get() ), data_size );
00094                 return true;
00095             }
00096         };
00097         const std::pair<std::string, std::string> splitted = makeBasename( filename );
00098         unsigned short type = image.getMajorTypeID();
00099 
00100         std::string typeStr = util::getTypeMap( false )[type];
00101         typeStr.erase( typeStr.find_last_not_of( '*' ) + 1 );
00102 
00103         const std::string outName = splitted.first + "_" + image.getSizeAsString() + "_" + typeStr + splitted.second ;
00104 
00105         LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "Writing image of size " << image.getSizeAsVector() << " and type " << typeStr << " to " << outName;
00106         WriteOp writer( outName, type );
00107         const_cast<data::Image &>( image ).foreachChunk( writer );
00108     }
00109     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
00110 };
00111 }
